text:
With Pfizer's Michigan plant a stone's throw from Canada, why do Canadians have to import from Belgium?

Please reverse Trump's Dec executive order.

With world's longest border & as largest bi-lateral traders, only makes economic sense. 🇨🇦🇺🇲
